name: Potion seller
text: A cure? Ahh, I have a concoction that can make you see some crazy things! Or another one that’s strong enough to knock out a dragon!

name: Potion seller
text: I got this one that can make it feel like everything’s slow, or this one that… actually I’m pretty sure this one turns you into a gator. Or a dog.

name: Potion seller
text: But no, I don’t have one that can cure the corruption. Unless turning demons into dogs counts as a cure.
